name: Alres Restaurant
description: A modern restaurant website with an interactive design, created as a submission for the Becomimg a Front-End Web Developer Expert class by Dicoding. It features a menu, gallery and a simple ordering system that uses an API.

name: Personal Blog
description: A simple blog website with a clean and responsive layout. Created as a submission for the Basic Web Programming class by Dicoding, displaying static articles using semantic HTML.

name: Bookshelf App
description: A digital bookshelf app that allows users to add, search and move books between reading statuses. Submitted for Dicoding's Beginner Front-End Web class.

name: Barcamp App
description: A drink exploration app that utilizes a REST API to display a list of various types of drinks along with their details. This project was created as part of the Learn Fundamental Front-End Web Development class by Dicoding. It focuses on fetching external data using the fetch API and managing dynamic data on the frontend.

name: Aratek Homepage
description: The official homepage of Aratek showcasing the company profile, services, and contact information. Focused on fast loading speed and professional design.

name: Aratek Admin Page
description: Admin page for Aratek's internal system. Displays user data and content management features. Equipped with search and filter functionality.

name: Duta Jaringan Indonesia
description: Company profile website for Duta Jaringan Indonesia, complete with service information and project documentation

name: Duta Jaringan Indonesia Homepage (Remake)
description: A remake version of DJI's homepage to improve the interface and user experience.

name: Simasti
description: Simasti's internal data management system that allows admins to efficiently manage financial data through a structured UI.

name: UNIMAL Academic Portal
description: A redesigned version of the UNIMAL academic portal page with a focus on readability and better data structure.
